Description: The Dropwizard framework aims to provide the development of ops-friendly, high-performance, RESTful web services. The framework aims to pull together stable, mature libraries from the Java ecosystem into a simple, light-weight package. Dropwizard has features such as support for configuration, application metrics, logging, operational tools, and much more.

The Netty framework's goal is to provide a NIO client server framework which enables quick development of network applications such as protocol servers and clients. It aims to greatly simplify and streamline network programming such as TCP and UDP socket server.
Vert.x is a tool-kit framework that aims to provide reactive web applications on the JVM. It has a variety of language options such as Java, Groovy, Ruby and JavaScript.
Vert.x is a tool-kit framework that aims to provide reactive web applications on the JVM. It has a variety of language options such as Java, Groovy, Ruby and JavaScript.

The Derive4j framework's goal is to provide a Java 8 annotation processor and framework for deriving algebraic data types constructors, pattern-matching, morphisms, (near future: optics and typeclasses).

The Checker Framework aims to enhance Java’s type system to make it more powerful and useful. This allows for software developers to detect and prevent errors in Java programs. The Checker Framework intends to include compiler plug-ins ("checkers") that find bugs or verify.
The Axon framework's goal is focused on creating a java application based on the CQRS principles. The framework in intended to be used in many of environments and offer full scalability.
Vert.x is a tool-kit framework that aims to provide reactive web applications on the JVM. It has a variety of language options such as Java, Groovy, Ruby and JavaScript.

HK2 is a light-weight and dynamic dependency injection framework. Some of the things that can be done with HK2 are custom lifecycles and scopes, events, AOP and other proxies, custom injection resolution, and more.

The Guice framework intends to alleviate the need for factories in Java code. The frameworks still allows for the need to write factories in some cases, but code will not depend directly on them to promote ease of use.

The Dagger 2 framework intends to provide a compile-time evolution approach to dependency injection. The frameworks aims to eliminate all reflection, and improve code clarity by removing the traditional ObjectGraph/Injector in favor of user-specified Component interfaces.

Apache DeltaSpike is framework library that intends to provide a collection of portable CDI extensions. It provides ready-to-use modules that can enable developers to integrate tested API extensions into Java projects.
Singularity is a web application that aims to provide a platform for running and scheduling Apache Mesos tasks including long running processes, scheduled jobs, and one-off tasks.

Apache Aurora is a framework that aims to provide a service scheduler that runs on top of Apache Mesos, enabling developers to run long-running services that take advantage of Apache Mesos’ scalability, fault-tolerance, and resource isolation.
Orika is a Java Bean mapping framework that aims to recursively copies data from one object to another. It is intended to be useful when developing multi-layered applications.

Hibernate is an open source Java ORM framework that aims to provide data query and retrieval facilities that intends to reduce development time. The goal of the framework is to avoid the boilerplate code caused by using JDBC and SQL.

Spring framework is an open source application framework that intends to provide key features such as the “IOC (Inversion Of Control) and AOP (Aspect Oriented Programming)”. The Framework aims to be a comprehensive programming and configuration model for modern Java-based “enterprise applications.”

The goal of the Tryton Python Framework is to provide functionalities for a complete application framework. It's features include data persistence, extensive modularity, users management (authentication, fine grained control for data access, handling of concurrent access of resources), workflow and report engines, web services and internationalisation.

Pychievements is a framework that aims to create and track achievements within a Python application. It intends to include functions specifically for to create command line applications yet also flexible enough to be used for web applications.

3DModelComposer JavaScript Framework by PS WebDev allows developers to create galleries of customizable 3D models. It gives users a way to build models using parts & modifiers that the developers prepared.
Reactive is a Scala framework that offers a library framework for reactive web routing and web UIs.

Finantra is a production use as Twitter’s HTTP framework written that intends to offer feature and integration test support as well as optional JSR-330 Dependency Injection using Google Guice for Scala applications. The framework aims to provide a Jackson based JSON parsing to support required fields, default values, and custom validations.

The Colossus framework intends to offer a lightweight Scala framework for building applications in Scala that require non-blocking network I/O. The framework aims to maximize performance while keeping the interface clean and concise.
Chaos aims to provide developers with a lightweight framework for writing REST services in Scala.
Chai is a JavaScript framework that intends to offer a BDD / TDD assertion framework library for node that can be paired with any javascript testing framework.
Pluma is an open source C++ framework that aims to provide support for plug-in management.

The OWASP Mantra PHP framework aims to be a security framework that intends to have a collection of free and open source tools integrated into a web browser for penetration testers, web application developers, security professionals as well as others.

WebSploit is a MITM Framework that aims to provide a security testing platform. The PHP based framework offers several features such as fake access point attack, web killer attack, bluetooth POD attack as well as others.
